channel.title: Tradings on Blog of Random things
channel.description: Recent content in Tradings on Blog of Random things

item.title: Jan 2022 Stock Market
item.description: January 2022 was not a good month for stock market. The market was down and a lot of sellings going on. Looking at SPY ETF prices from Nov 2021 to Jan 2022 (All prices are from Yahoo Finance): Not only the prices went down, it has gone down below 20 day SMA, 50 day SMA, 100 day SMA and 200 day SMA very quickly within a few days. 200 day SMA is particularly important support level as it is usually used separate bull and bear market.
